item.title: Rounded Corners
item.description:
WCPA Rounded corners for custom wood orders

First, we need to determine the minmax of the cuts for each corner. This cuts must be relative to the width and the length. The goal is to allow users to customize order not just by adding rounded corners on the required sides, but also, allows granular measurement for irregular shapes, and routing.

We need to start from the 4 sided measurements

First, we need to identify the mid-point variable where,

item.title: Free Up Space Ubuntu
item.description:
1. Clear the APT Cache

Find out how large is the apt package cache:

du -sh /var/cache/apt/archives

Clear the cache:

sudo apt-get clean

2. Remove Old Kernels

Not sure how it works, really but here we go,

Proceed with caution:

sudo apt-get autoremove --purge

3. Last, stay up to date

Do this regularly

sudo apt update && upgrade

You can read the full article where I found the above commands here.

item.title: Github
item.description:
My first encounter with Github

All I knew about GitHub was some sort of place where you dump codes and make it available to the public. But still, I have no idea what is the purpose of it, at all. Until Tasnim, enlightened me what it really was. See, of course I’ve watched a few YouTube videos of what GitHub is, I kind of get the idea but do not know how it works, what is it for, etcetera.
